sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input type="number" class="num-input" :class="getClass()" :max="max" :min="min" :value="default" />
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'NumeralInput',
  props: {
    default: String,
    max: Number,
    min: Number,
    size: String
  },
  methods: {
    getClass() {
        let className = "small";
        if(this.size == "large") {
            className = "large";
        }
        return className;
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.num-input {
    font-family: inherit;
    transition: var(--hover-anim);
    background: var(--grey5);
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 1px solid var(--grey8);
    border-radius: var(--radius-xs);
    font-weight: 400;
    color: var(--grey9);
    text-align: center;
}
.num-input.large {
    height: 4.8rem;
    font-size: var(--text-md);
    padding: 0 var(--space-md);
}
.num-input.small {
  height: 3.2rem;
  font-size: var(--text-sm);
  font-weight: 700;
  padding: 0 var(--space-sm);
}
.num-input:hover {
    background: var(--grey4);
}

</style>
